name: Cat in a Croc
text: Hello, it’s nice to meet you!

name: Cat in a Croc
text: Welcome to the wonderful town of [Town name]!

name: Cat in a Croc
text: I know you’re new around here but I’ll be in paw’s reach if you have any trouble.

name: Cat in a Croc
text: *whisper* There’s a little bit of magic up my Croc, I can help you with anything.

name: Cat in a Croc
text: So, I heard you came to [Town name] looking for some new projects to work on?

name: Me
text: Actually, yeah. That would be great.

name: Cat in a Croc
text: Oh how perfect, I know a few friends who REALLY need some help with their websites.

name: Cat in a Croc
text: I’m sure with your expertise, you’ll get them where they need to be!

name: Cat in a Croc
text: If you don’t know what to do, don’t worry about it.

name: Cat in a Croc
text: I’ll help you learn what you need to know-

name: Cat in a Croc
text: *phone rings*

name: Cat in a Croc
text: Oh shoot! That’s them. I have to go, but I’ll teach you what you'll know in a moment.

name: Me
text: I wonder why they were in such a rush..

name: Me
text: It's been a minute.. I wonder where they went.

name: Me
text: (You see an old cat slowly making their way to you from afar)

name: Me
text: *thinking* Should I help him? He's taking his sweet time..

name: Old Man
text: Oh hi there young lad.. Were you just with that one handsome orange tabby earlier?

name: Me
text: *thinking* Wait a minute..

name: Me
text: Aren’t you the same cat but with a different colored Croc??

name: Old Man
text: And I thought my eyes were old..

name: Old Man
text: Thank you, I guess I ldo ook great for my old age.

name: Old Man
text: Anyway, I need some help with this website I’ve been working on and I have no idea what any of these buttons do.

name: Old Man
text: I can’t keep up with the youngins nowadays, but I still have to try.

name: Old Man
text: This website is supposed to be a basic search page.

name: Old Man
text: Could you help this old man out with this?

name: Me
text: I guess I'll give it a shot. I’ll try my best.
